resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104620</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104620</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exponential Numbers - Grade 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponentiale Zahlen - Grad 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nombres Exponentiels - Catégorie 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números Exponenciais - Classe 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri Esponenziali - Grado 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκθετικοί αριθμοί - βαθμός 11</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Números Exponenciales - Grado 11</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In Grade 10 we studied exponential numbers and learnt that there were six laws that made working with exponential numbers easier. There is one law that we did not study in Grade 10. This will be described here.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In Grad 10 studierten wir exponentiale Zahlen und 
erfuhren, daß es sechs Gesetze gab, die bildeten, arbeitend mit 
exponentialen Zahlen einfacher. Es gibt ein Gesetz, das wir 
nicht in Grad 10 studierten. Dieses wird hier beschrieben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la catégorie 10 nous avons étudié des 
nombres exponentiels et avons appris qu'il y avait six lois qui ont 
facilité travaillant avec des nombres exponentiels. Il y a une 
loi que nous n'avons pas étudiée dans la catégorie 10. Ceci 
sera décrit ici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na classe 10 nós estudamos números exponenciais 
e aprendemos que havia seis leis que fizeram trabalhando com números 
exponenciais mais fácil. Há uma lei que nós não estudamos na
classe 10. Isto será descrito aqui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel grado 10 abbiamo studiato i numeri 
esponenziali ed abbiamo imparato che ci erano sei leggi che hanno reso
funzionando con i numeri esponenziali più facile. Ci è una 
legge che non abbiamo studiato nel grado 10. Ciò sarà 
descritta qui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο βαθμό 10 μελετήσαμε τους εκθετικούς αριθμούς και 
μάθαμε ότι υπήρξαν έξι νόμοι που κατέστησαν την εργασία με τους
εκθετικούς αριθμούς ευκολότερη. Υπάρχει ένας νόμος που δεν
μελετήσαμε στο βαθμό 10. Αυτό θα περιγραφεί εδώ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el grado 10 estudiamos números exponenciales y
aprendimos que había seis leyes que hicieron trabajando con números 
exponenciales más fácil. Hay una ley que no estudiamos en el 
grado 10. Esto será descrita aquí.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104620</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/exponential-numbers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
